amendatorysection.chaptername: CITIES AND VILLAGES; LAWS APPLICABLE TO MORE THAN ONE AND LESS THAN ALL CLASSES
amendatorysection.catchline: Districts created prior to May 23, 1979; governed by act.
amendatorysection.para: Any business improvement district or any downtown improvement and parking district created prior to May 23, 1979, pursuant to sections 19-3401 to 19-3420 or 19-4001 to 19-4014, shall continue in existence and shall hereafter be governed by the Business Improvement District Act.
